project_name: 2024 WayV CONCERT [ON THE Way] IN MACAU 威神
project_info:
票价说明：港币/澳门币票价 HKD/MOP :1888/ 1488/ 888人民币售价CNY：1719元/ 1359元/ 809元，门票已含境外（含港澳台）服务费
 
配送说明：
本项目门票不支持退换，不可转让。一人一票，入场时必需持有有效门票。购票成功的客户，请您提前办理好港澳通行证-中国澳门签注。当天如出现遗失或忘带门票情况不予处理，感谢您的支持与理解。
 
演出介绍：
[2024 WayV CONCERT [ON THE Way] IN MACAU] TICKET ANNOUNCEMENT 售票公告
 演出日期：2025.02.15 (SAT) 7:30PM
（实际演出时间以现场状况为准Actual performance time based on on-site situation）
📍演出地点: 中国澳门新濠影汇综艺馆 MACAU STUDIO CITY EVENT CENTER
▶WayZenNi WEVERSE Pre-sale: 2024/11/22 (FRI) 10:00 – 20:00 Local time
- Pre Sale at Fantopia & 大麦DAMAI only
▶General Sale：2024/11/23 (SAT) 12:00 Noon Local time~
- General Sale at Studio City official website, Fantopia & 大麦DAMAI
 
※TICKET PRICE (ALL SEATED):
-VIP SEATED|SOUND CHECK MOP$1888
*VIP TICKET *1 / 一张VIP门票
*SOUND CHECK EXPERIENCE / SOUND CHECK PARTY体验
*SOUND CHECK PASS + LANYARD / 彩排证+挂绳
-PLATINUM MOP$1888
-GOLD RV MOP$1888
※PLATINUM & GOLD RV MOP$1888随机电脑抽取30名幸运粉丝获得限量签名海报(不包括彩排套组购买客户) Random Lucky draw of 30 signed poster winners of MOP$1888 purchase (Excluding VIP SEATED|SOUND CHECK purchase)
-A MOP$1488 ※随机电脑抽取10名幸运粉丝获得限量签名拍立得Random Lucky draw of 10 signed polaroid winners
-B MOP$888
 
*无论是会员预售还是公开发售，都请记得预先登记成为各票务网站会员才可购票。Must complete ticketing website member registration before proceeding any ticket purchase.
*登记会员并不保证成功购票。您的WayZenNi WEVERSE会员编号即为您的预购码(例: WW123456789) Registration does not guarantee you a ticket. Your WayZenNi WEVERSE number will be your presale promo code
*请于售票前预先确认各售票平台支援之付款方式及配送票券规则。
Please pre-check each ticketing system’s payment method and tickets delivery restrictions before proceeding your purchase.
*会员预购每笔ID限购一张票券，公开售票每人每交易限购四张票券(含一张会员预购票券)。若经核对发现同一会员ID购票数超过一张，主办单位有权取消该票券交易。
*Purchase limit is 1 ticket for WayZenNi WEVERSE pre-sale and 4 tickets per show (including the 1 ticket purchased during the pre-sale) per transaction for general sale. If more than 1 ticket are purchased with the same membership ID after verification, the organizer has the right to cancel the ticket transaction.
*所有票价均为坐席(对号入座)。Each ticket is assigned a specific seat.
*每张门票只供一人进场。入场时必需持有有效门票。One person per ticket regardless of age. A valid ticket is required for admission
*演出门票如有遗失、损毁，涂污或被窃，主办及售票机构概不补发或更换门票，亦不会承担任何责任，敬请小心保管。
If ticket is lost, damaged, defaced or stolen, the Organizer and ticketing agency will not reissue or replace the ticket, and will not bear any responsibility. Please keep it carefully.
#WayV #威神V #ONTHEWay #CONCERT #KUN #TEN #XIAOJUN #HENDERY #YANGYANG #iMeAsia #IMEMACAU #澳门新濠影汇 #StudioCityMacau #StudioCityEventCenter
